{"step_by_step_thinking": "Mantle cell lymphoma (MCL) is typically characterized by the overexpression of cyclin D1 due to a chromosomal translocation. However, there are cases of MCL that are cyclin D1-negative. According to the documents, a marker that has been found to be useful in identifying these cyclin D1-negative MCL cases is SOX11. Therefore, the correct answer is SOX11.", "answer_choice": "A"}
